CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 12, 1966, pg. 12A, reads: "In Front - Members of the Holy Cross basketball team, leaders of the W. C. A. F. basketball league's Junior Division, are shown above.  Kneeling left to right, are Alvin Evans, Teddy Mitchell, David Barrett, Craig Jones and Dwight Rodgers.  Standing, from left, Alex Ball, Coy Allen, coach; Eric Dykes, Kerry Muckler, Anthony Fountain, Anthony Terry, Clarence Evans, Charles Gaines, Allen Fleming, assistant coach and Paul Dorsey.  (Harris Photo)"
TitMainTitle: Holy Cross basketball team, kneeling from left: Alvin Evans, Teddy Mitchell, David Barrett, Craig Jones, Dwight Rodgers; standing: Alex Ball, coach Coy Allen, Eric Dykes, Kerry Muckler, Anthony Fountain, Anthony Terry, Clarence Evans, Charles Gaines, assistant coach Allen Fleming, and Paul Dorsey
